title: Shark StainStriker Pet Stain & Spot Cleaner, £129 at Very
text: Shark StainStriker Pet Stain & Spot Cleaner Shark StainStriker Pet Stain & Spot Cleaner PX200UKT Powerful Cleaning That's Ideal For Households With Pets. FOR SPILLS & STAINS Introducing Shark StainStriker Pet - the best stubborn stain remover*. Perfect for homes with pets, this compact, powerful spot cleaner delivers supercharged pet stain and odour removal anywhere in your home. Easily tackle spills and stains on carpets and rugs, stairs, sofas and upholstery, car interiors, pet beds, and more.
